content: 3 section 2 more times fo attach all letters using running stitch don t forget to stitch around o s inner circle background panel color a row 1 chain 42 double_crochet in 3rd chain and across 40 row 2 23 chain 2 double_crochet across 40 fo border color b ● single_crochet across top ● 3 single_crochet in corner ● single_crochet 22 evenly down side ● 3 single_crochet single_crochet 38 3 single_crochet along bottom ● single_crochet 22 up side ● 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet ● slip_stitch to join ● slip_stitch in each st around slip_stitch to join fo final assembly 28 ● arrange pieces as desired ● use running stitch to attach each component ● weave in all ends ● block if needed 29
